sentences.en: " Therefore, prophesy against them, son of man, prophesy! "
sentences.cn: 结 11:4 人子阿 、 因此 、 你当说豫言、说豫言攻击他们.

sentences.en: Another rare gift is the Inner Eye, the ability to prophesy.
sentences.cn: 天眼是另一项罕见的天赋, 这项天赋用于预言.

sentences.en: For we know in part, and we prophesy in part.
sentences.cn: 我们现在所知道的有限, 先知所讲的也有限.

sentences.en: He refused to prophesy when the economy would begin to improve.
sentences.cn: 他不愿推测经济何时好转.

sentences.en: I prophesy that he'll be back in the old job.
I wouldn't like to prophesy who will win the election.
sentences.cn: 我不愿预言谁将在这次选举中获胜.

sentences.en: I'm not going to prophesy about this.
sentences.cn: 对于这一点我将不作预言.

sentences.en: It was prophesy, and you were born with it already published.
sentences.cn: 它是预言, 当你出生时它已经散布于世了.

sentences.en: Monks and nuns who prophesy are not of that rareness.
sentences.cn: 说预言的修士和修女,很少有这个祥子的.

sentences.en: Son set thy face against Zidon and prophesy against it.
sentences.cn: 21人子啊,你要向西顿预言攻击他.

sentences.en: There was a great war between the countries, just as the elders had prophesied.
sentences.cn: 正像长者们所预言的，那些国家之间爆发了一场大规模战争。

sentences.en: Therefore prophesy against them, prophesy , O son of man.
sentences.cn: 4人子阿,因此你当说预言, 说预言攻击他们.

sentences.en: Therefore prophesy against them; prophesy, son of man.
sentences.cn: 人子阿,因此你当说预言, 说预言攻击他们.

sentences.en: We cannot prophesy what may happen.
sentences.cn: 我们无法预言会发生什么.

sentences.en: Wherefore, brethren, covet to prophesy, and forbid not to speak with tongues.
sentences.cn: 所以我弟兄们, 你们要切慕作先知讲道, 也不要禁止说方言.

trans.tran_en: to say what will happen in the future, especially using religious or magical knowledge
